name: Chibi Maruko-chan: Waku Waku Shopping
summary: Chibi Maruko-chan: Waku Waku Shopping is the 8th video board game based on Momoko Sakura's Chibi Maruko-chan slice of life manga and anime about a troublemaking grade-schooler and her friends and family. Maruko and her classmates Tamae, Kazuhiko, and Sueo move around a board and increase/decrease their money and happiness totals depending on where they land. Other squares might produce random effects or offer items to buy.
